Roll.definition: a document containing an official record 2

1.definition: a document containing an official record

sub_terms.a: a list of members of a legislative body [the clerk called the and recorded the votes]
sub_terms.b: a list of practitioners in a court or the courts of a state usually used in pl.
sub_terms.c: a record kept by an authorized official of persons or property or both that are subject to taxation
